description:
Throughout my business career, I have been amazed at how many people talk about wanting to start a business but never do. I have heard from countless people over the years whom have spent large amounts of money; their own or others in starting a business just to loose it all.

There is a better way. You don’t need to spend precious time and money in pursuing your dreams. I have structured this course to guide you step by step through the process of starting your own business without risk.  I have included learning exercises to prepare you for the mental attitudes and skills generally known to create success.

I have also include many additional resources to facilitate ongoing learning and growth. Everyday I spend time researching and writing on the latest trends in marketing and Internet usage. I will share the those findings and trends with you as part of this course.  Come join me now and start your business future today. Your success is my goal.
title: Start Your Business Today - Mini Bootcamp for Everyone
